name: Virgil
description:
Explore a wondrous monochrome stylized world. You control both a living fire spirit, and a ghost, and together they can overcome any obstacle.

Works with both keyboard/mouse and Xbox Controller

WASD/Left Thumb stick: Moves the ghost

Mouse flicks/Right Thumb stick: Jumps the fire spirit to torches
